recipesJson.name: Snake Blood
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: Strawberry & Coconut go so well together. Give coconuts and cream a week to combine.

reviews.text: Struggled with a tiger's blood recipe for months because you can't find the watermelon that you want?  Just say fuck it and make this instead.  Because I said so, and because it's good.
Love this recipe. Everything melds together very nicely for a very satisfying vape.
